column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////This is a great tapas place with a variety of decor depending on whether you sit at the busy and bustling bar or get a nice table with dim lighting and romantic decor for a nice night out. I had the latter and it was a great time to just chat with my girl. The waitress was really friendly and recommended the rack of lamb special of the day
column2: which we eagerly enjoyed couples with the brussel sprout salad (which is really shredded brussel sprouts in a Caesar Salad-esque style with nuts)
column4: and the paella mixta which was dank. Would recommend for a nice date out with options for the type of mood with the different spots (busy bar or quiet table).
